info.name: Collection
info.description:
This is the GoApi documentation. You can find out more about the project on the [GoApi Repository](https://gl.traveligo.com/t1/go-api).
Some useful links:
- [GoApi Repository](https://gl.traveligo.com/t1/go-api)

request.description: Pre allocate experience this is an optional step to allocate experience before booking to check for availability of the product

response.name: Pre allocate experience

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
The language of the response case insensitive
The preferred currency of the user

response.body:
{
  "status": true,
  "message": "Pre allocate experience",
  "data": {
    "id": "<string>",
    "ticket_name": "<string>",
    "ticket_slug": "<string>",
    "tier": "general",
    "mobile_number": "<string>",
    "photo_cover_path": "<string>",
    "expired": "<dateTime>",
    "itineraryDetail": [
      {
        "photoPath": "<string>",
        "detail": "<string>",
        "time": "<string>",
        "addressDetail": "<string>",
        "airportId": "<number>",
        "countryId": "<number>",
        "areaId": "<number>",
        "cityId": "<number>"
      },
      {
        "photoPath": "<string>",
        "detail": "<string>",
        "time": "<string>",
        "addressDetail": "<string>",
        "airportId": "<number>",
        "countryId": "<number>",
        "areaId": "<number>",
        "cityId": "<number>"
      }
    ],
    "meetingPoint": {
      "id": "<number>",
      "name": "<string>",
      "address": "<string>",
      "location": {
        "latitude": "<number>",
        "longitude": "<number>"
      },
      "isCustom": "<boolean>"
    },
    "freeCancellation": false,
    "cancellationPolicy": null,
    "photoPath": null,
    "howToUse": {
      "header": "<string>",
      "list": [
        "<string>",
        "<string>"
      ]
    },
    "termsAndConditions": {
      "title": "<string>",
      "description": [
        "<string>",
        "<string>"
      ]
    },
    "redeemStart": "<string>",
    "redeemEnd": "<string>",
    "area_slug": "<string>",
    "city_slug": "<string>",
    "country_slug": "<string>",
    "totalAdult": "<number>",
    "totalChild": "<number>",
    "totalSenior": "<number>",
    "totalPrepack": "<number>",
    "totalAmount": "<number>",
    "totalPrice": "<number>",
    "currency": "<string>",
    "keySearchTimeExpire": 3600,
    "minPax": "<number>",
    "maxPax": "<number>"
  }
}

item.name: Get the list of available hotels

header.description: The language of the response case insensitive
The preferred currency of the user
If the user is logged in, the data token is required to see the user-specific data

query.description: (Required) The destination id can be found from dexter search
(Required) Total adult, value must between number of total room to number of total room * 4 Such as (total room = 1 value must be in 1 to 4)
(Required) Total child, value must between 0 to number of total room*2 Such as (total room = 1 value must be in 0 to 2)
The country of passport 2 letter code
(Required) The page number can set 0 for for all hotels
(Required) Limit for get all hotels, if set 0 is get all

item.name: Get the hotel cancellation policy by booking number

request.description: Get the hotel cancellation policy by booking number

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
If the user is logged in, the data token is required to see the user-specific data

formdata.description: (Required) The reason for the cancellation (This can only be one of HEALTH,MAJEURE,CHANGES_PLANS,DISSATISFACTION_ACCOMMODATION,FINANCIAL,VISA,TRAVEL,PERSONAL,CANCELLATION_ACCOMMODATION,OTHER)
The cToken can be used to cancel the booking as a guest user. Can get by search booking API
